mapper.select: SELECT medical_subcate, medical_name, medical_price, medical_buying, medical_company, medical_buyEa FROM medicalList WHERE medical_category != '진료' ORDER BY medical_name
SELECT DISTINCT medical_company FROM medicalList WHERE medical_company IS NOT NULL ORDER BY medical_company
SELECT DISTINCT medical_subcate FROM medicalList WHERE medical_category != '진료' ORDER BY medical_subcate
